Property.name: Seed
Property.HelpText: Set a specific value (between -2147483647 and 2147483647) to get a specific RNG, or 0 for full random.

Property.name: StorySplits
Property.HelpText: Select which story you would like splits for. (Note: The splits are generated in the root of your SADX folder as soon as you clic on "Save and Play".)

Property.name: RNGCharacters
Property.HelpText: When enabled, characters will be random. (Note: This has no effect if you disable "Randomize Stages".)

Property.name: RNGStages
Property.HelpText: When enabled, stages will always be random.

Property.name: DupliCheck
Property.HelpText: When enabled, Randomizer will try to avoid the same combinations.

Property.name: RNGCutscene
Property.HelpText: When enabled, a random cutscene will play after completed a stage or boss. (Note: This has no effect if you disable "Randomize Stages".)

Property.name: SA2M2
Property.HelpText: Allow the randomizer to add custom SA2 mission. (Collect 100 rings).

Property.name: SA2M3
Property.HelpText: Allow the randomizer to add custom SA2 mission. (Lost Chao).

Property.name: Upgrade
Property.HelpText: Have all upgrades. [Highly Recommended]

Property.name: Vanilla
Property.HelpText: Allow vanilla stage character combination.

Property.name: RNGVoices
Property.HelpText: Randomize Voices.... "Did you insert a memory card?". (Note: Special Rando custom voices won't be randomized.)

Property.name: RNGMusic
Property.HelpText: Randomize music... wanna hear that Chao sad music?

Property.name: AmySpeed
Property.HelpText: Increase Amy's maximum acceleration [Highly Recommended].

Property.name: BigSpeed
Property.HelpText: Increase Big's maximum acceleration [Highly Recommended].

Property.name: Sonic
Property.HelpText: Ban Sonic from the roster. (Note: if you ban Sonic, you won't get Metal Sonic or Super Sonic either.)

Property.name: Tails
Property.HelpText: Ban Tails from the roster.

Property.name: Knuckles
Property.HelpText: Ban Knuckles from the roster.

Property.name: Amy
Property.HelpText: Ban Amy from the roster.

Property.name: Big
Property.HelpText: Ban Big from the roster.

Property.name: Gamma
Property.HelpText: Ban E-102 Gamma from the roster.

Property.name: MetalSonic
Property.HelpText: Ban Metal Sonic from the roster.

Property.name: SuperSonic
Property.HelpText: Ban Super Sonic from the roster.

Property.name: isAIAllowed
Property.HelpText: Allow a random AI to follow you. (note: AI won't spawn during few specific places.)

Property.name: isChaoGameplayAllowed
Property.HelpText: [CHAO GAMEPLAY MOD REQUIRED] When enabled, your Chao will follow and protect you. (note: Rando will send you to the chao garden.)

Property.name: Viper
Property.HelpText: Reduces Egg Viper HP. (Note: This has no effect with Critical Mode enabled.)
